abstract: Colorado Rapids defeat New York Red Bulls, 2-1.

headline.print_headline: Scoring Drought Ends, but Red Bulls Lose Again
headline.main: Scoring Drought Ends, but Red Bulls Lose Again

keywords.value: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The team got a reprieve from the shutouts that have piled up this season but fell to last place in the Eastern Conference with a loss at Colorado.
lead_paragraph: The team got a reprieve from the shutouts that have piled up this season but fell to last place in the Eastern Conference with a loss at Colorado.
